014
015package org.basepom.mojo.dvc;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
018import static org.basepom.mojo.dvc.ScopeLimitingFilter.Scope.compile;
019import static org.basepom.mojo.dvc.ScopeLimitingFilter.Scope.provided;
020import static org.basepom.mojo.dvc.ScopeLimitingFilter.Scope.runtime;
021import static org.basepom.mojo.dvc.ScopeLimitingFilter.Scope.system;
022import static org.basepom.mojo.dvc.ScopeLimitingFilter.Scope.test;
023
024import java.util.EnumSet;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Set;
027
028import com.google.common.base.MoreObjects;
029import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
030import org.eclipse.aether.graph.DependencyFilter;
031import org.eclipse.aether.graph.DependencyNode;
032import org.eclipse.aether.util.artifact.JavaScopes;
033
034public final class ScopeLimitingFilter
035        implements DependencyFilter {
036
037    public static final String COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME = JavaScopes.COMPILE + "+" + JavaScopes.RUNTIME;
038    public static final String RUNTIME_PLUS_SYSTEM = JavaScopes.RUNTIME + "+" + JavaScopes.SYSTEM;
039
040    enum Scope {
041        compile, runtime, test, provided, system
042    }
043
044    private final ImmutableSet<Scope> scopes;
045
046    /**
047     * @param scope A maven scope name.
048     * @return A filter that matches any dependency that would be visible in the given scope.
049     */
050    public static ScopeLimitingFilter computeDependencyScope(final String scope) {
051        return new ScopeLimitingFilter(computeScopes(scope));
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * Returns filter that matches any transitive dependency that would be visible in the given scope. This is different from the scope above, as not all scopes
056     * are fully transitive (e.g. a test dependency is not transitively visible.
057     *
058     * @param scope A maven scope name.
059     * @return A filter that matches any dependency that would be visible in the given scope.
060     */
061    public static ScopeLimitingFilter computeTransitiveScope(final String scope) {
062        return new ScopeLimitingFilter(computeScopes(computeTransitiveScopes(scope)));
063    }
064
065    private ScopeLimitingFilter(Set<Scope> scopes) {
066        this.scopes = ImmutableSet.copyOf(scopes);
067    }
068
069    private static EnumSet<Scope> computeScopes(final String scope) {
070        checkNotNull(scope, "scope is null");
071
072        switch (scope) {
073            case JavaScopes.COMPILE:
074                return EnumSet.of(compile, system, provided);
075            case JavaScopes.RUNTIME:
076                return EnumSet.of(compile, runtime);
077            case COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME:
078                return EnumSet.of(compile, system, provided, runtime);
079            case RUNTIME_PLUS_SYSTEM:
080                return EnumSet.of(compile, system, runtime);
081            case JavaScopes.TEST:
082                return EnumSet.allOf(Scope.class);
083            default:
084                throw new IllegalStateException("Scope '" + scope + "' is unknown!");
085        }
086    }
087
088    private static String computeTransitiveScopes(final String scope) {
089        checkNotNull(scope, "scope is null");
090
091        switch (scope) {
092            case JavaScopes.COMPILE:
093            case JavaScopes.RUNTIME:
094            case COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME:
095            case RUNTIME_PLUS_SYSTEM:
096                return scope;
097            case JavaScopes.TEST:
098                return COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME;
099            case JavaScopes.PROVIDED:
100                return COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME; // remove test and provided
101            default:
102                throw new IllegalStateException("Scope '" + scope + "' is unknown!");
103        }
104    }
105
106    @Override
107    public boolean accept(final DependencyNode node, final List<DependencyNode> parents) {
108        checkNotNull(node, "node is null");
109
110        if (node.getDependency() == null) {
111            return true;
112        }
113        final String scope = node.getDependency().getScope();
114        switch (scope) {
115            case JavaScopes.COMPILE:
116                return scopes.contains(compile);
117            case JavaScopes.TEST:
118                return scopes.contains(test);
119            case JavaScopes.RUNTIME:
120                return scopes.contains(runtime);
121            case JavaScopes.PROVIDED:
122                return scopes.contains(provided);
123            case JavaScopes.SYSTEM:
124                return scopes.contains(system);
125            default:
126                return false;
127        }
128    }
129
130    @Override
131    public String toString() {
132        return MoreObjects.toStringHelper(this)
133                .add("scopes", scopes)
134                .toString();
135    }
136}
